Deficiency Narrative: It was observed 1 of 4 staff members did not have results from drug testing in their case file.
Correction Narrative: An email from the operation was received and included the drug screening for this employee dated 2.14.2020. Document can be found in SharePoint.

Deficiency Narrative: During the inspection 1 of 1 direct care staff member files pulled did not have required EBI annual trainings.
Correction Narrative: An email from the operation was received and included EBI training certificates for this staff member. A schedule for all staff was received for the next EBI training. Document can be found in SharePoint.

Deficiency Narrative: It was observed 1 of 4 staff members did not have TB test results in their staff files.
Correction Narrative: An email from the operation was received and included the negative TB test for this staff member.Document can be found in SharePoint.

Deficiency Narrative: It was observed that 1 of 4 staff members were missing the affidavit for applicants for employment form in their staff files.
Correction Narrative: An email from the operation was received and included this staff members notarized Licensing Affidavit for Applicants for Employment form. Document can be found in SharePoint.

Deficiency Narrative: RCCR was formerly notified on 04/11/22 that the operation did not have a designated full-time child-care administrator. The operation had until 07/12/2022 to hire/designate a full-time child-care administrator. As of 07/13/2022, this has not occurred.
Correction Narrative: The operation hired a full-time childcare administrator on 07/19/2022.

Deficiency Narrative: RCCR was formerly notified on 04/11/22 that the operation did not have a designated full-time child-care administrator. The operation had until 06/11/2022 to hire/designate a full-time child-care administrator. As of 06/12/2022, this has not occurred.
The operation has been without a full time licensed administrator since April 29, 2021.
Correction Narrative: An individual has been hired to fill the position of the CCA. The individual has submitted the required documents and is the process of becoming licensed. Along with this, there are two other individuals that are completing the process.

Deficiency Narrative: There is no documentation in the child's file of providing notice and/or any responses for the parents of information regarding the initial service plan meeting for the child.
Correction Narrative:
Documentation for a new intake was submitted via email to show how the operation is notifying the correct entities of the service plan timeframes. Contact with these individuals are being stored in the child's file. 
Along with this, current staff have been made aware of this standard and recognize what documentation needs to occur moving forward.
